text:
Upazila is an important unit in the administrative system of Bangladesh. An upazila is made up of a few villages or unions and a district is made up of a few upazilas. At present there are a total of 492 upazilas in 64 districts under 8 divisions of Bangladesh.
Etymology.
The word upazila is a combination of Sanskrit and Arabic. The sub is a Sanskrit prefix and the word zila is derived from the Arabic word dila.
